subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brazil won its second consecutive FIFA Beach World Cup, beating Mexico, 8-2, in the final in Rio de Janeiro. André and Bruno each scored two goals, giving Brazil its 11th world title in beach soccer since the event began in 1995.
